title: Follow live: Cavs look to bounce back in Game 2 vs. Pacers
Mitchell flies high for poster dunk in Game 2 of Pacers-Cavs
description: The Cavaliers guard flew high for the dunk, putting Pascal Siakam on a poster en route to an emphatic slam.
author: Anthony Gharib

title: 'Thank you Inter & Barca' - the game nobody wanted to end
description: Thirteen goals, countless comebacks and a whole mountain of chaos - Inter's win over Barcelona will go down as a Champions League classic.

title: Inter Miami relinquish option to speak to De Bruyne
description: Inter Miami relinquish their option to hold talks with Kevin de Bruyne when he leaves Manchester City this summer - leaving Chicago Fire in pole position to bring him to the MLS.

title: Real Madrid want Alexander-Arnold early to play in Club World Cup
description: Real Madrid have approached Liverpool about signing Trent Alexander-Arnold early so he can play in the Club World Cup in June.

title: 'Max ruined his own race' - Norris hits out at Verstappen after Miami clashes
description: Lando Norris says Max Verstappen "ruined his own race" as he hit out at the reigning world champion after their feisty battle at the Miami Grand Prix.

title: Dodgers star Shohei Ohtani becomes first player in MLB to reach 10 HRs and 10 SBs, a year after 50-50 season
description: The Dodgers star is on pace for just a 47-47 season.
author: Jack Baer

title: Report: Tyrese Haliburton had X-rays of injured wrist at halftime of Pacers vs. Cavs Game 2
description: Tyrese Haliburton started the second half after getting an X-ray on his left wrist at halftime. He also gets the wrist heavily taped.
